OOC: No problem with that Talon being somewhere inside the Ark. I had
writt=
en that the blast from Hydras and crew opening the door blasted
Talon into =
Stassis Lock, but other wise salvagable when the time
comes. If you wish to=
 change that, give some ideas for what you are
looking for. I don't think T=
uscon had time to put Talon in too many
different places since he basically=
 came in looking for the rather
elusive intruder.

However I am open to sug=
gestions :)

- Preston
